titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of July 2024 as "National Sarcoma Awareness Month".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of July 2024 as "National Sarcoma Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of July 2024 as National Sarcoma Awareness Month. Sarcoma is a cancer of connective tissues, such as nerves, muscles, joints, fat, bones, and blood vessels.
